import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Slider from "react-slick" import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; function Footer({user}) { // -- Mega en Vivo -- // const [megatitle, setTitle] = useState([]); const [megatv, setMegatv] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get('https://www.megatravel.com.mx/developers/cafe-carousel/megatv').then(res => { const megatv = res.data.collection; setMegatv(megatv); const megatitle = res.data.title; setTitle(megatitle); }); }, []) // -- Fin Mega en Vivo -- // return ( <>
